subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Nextel Cup Series
lead_paragraph: MARTINSVILLE, Va., Oct. 21 (AP) — Jimmie Johnson made the pass he did not allow Jeff Gordon to make in the spring, sneaking inside Gordon with 44 laps to go Sunday and holding on to win at Martinsville Speedway for his series-high seventh victory of the year.
